name: Koshex
headline: Automating wealth creation for 400M Indian millennials
description: Koshex is building Wealthfront for India with data-driven insights around day to day finances for an individual to save more and invest well. We are automating wealth creation for 400 million Indian millennials with access to more than US$700bn of individual investable wealth.

founders.name: Akash Agrawal, Founder
founders.description: Ola, Capital Float, Rothschild & UBS Investment Bank

founders.name: Komal Kumar Gupta, Founder
founders.description: Interest: Mathematics, Binary, Data, Non-Fictions & Philosophy.

## 
Data Security? We Got That Covered.
Covered. 
  * The only person who can see your data is you.
  * Our security standards are as strong as your bank. We use **Military-Grade Encryption****(AES 256)** on your data. 
  * Every piece of personally and financially identifiable information is scrambled - from the e-mail you use to log in to the personally identifiable data associated with your linked financial accounts. 


![security chest](https://www.koshex.com/assets\\images\\new-images\\updated-home-mobile\\security\\security_1_1x.webp)
CUSTOMERS SPEAK TRUTH 
## Trusted By Every
##  Type Of Investor

![Goolge rating](https://d17dvj69ou3p5n.cloudfront.net/assets/images/landing-page/google-rating.svg)

Sneha Malhotra
Product Manager at Facebook, NRI
‚ÄúI found Koshex during this pandemic. While my life flows in Silicon Valley, Koshex is there to keep every single dollar at its best in India. I‚Äôm enjoying by the product and experience so far. Good job guys!‚Äù 
![profile pic](https://d17dvj69ou3p5n.cloudfront.net/assets/images/landing-page/rishi.jpeg)
Rishi Mehrotra
Senior Engineer, Agra
‚ÄúI have been using Koshex for the last 6 months and the experience is just great. What I found best is that Koshex is totally driven by my needs and every plan which they suggest is aligned to my financial goals which is something I could not find anywhere else.‚Äù 
![profile pic](https://d17dvj69ou3p5n.cloudfront.net/assets/images/landing-page/akriti.jpg)
Akriti Budhia
Consultant, Bangalore
‚ÄúMy father used to make all my investment decisions offline. During this pandemic, Koshex reached out to me and helped me convert them online all by myself and track them too. They have helped me keep a detailed eye on my expenses and investments.‚Äù 
![profile pic](https://d17dvj69ou3p5n.cloudfront.net/assets/images/landing-page/shubham.jpg)
Shubham Agrawal
Sr. Data Scientist, Jamshedpur
‚ÄúThere are many platforms that track your expenses or help you with investments. But Koshex helped me in solving both the problems quite effectively. I love the fact they keep my savings rate on the watch. Now, I can manage finances easily all in one place.‚Äù 
![profile pic](https://d17dvj69ou3p5n.cloudfront.net/assets/images/landing-page/megha.jpg)

Software Engineer, J&K
‚ÄúThere are many investment platforms out there, but nothing I have found as powerful as Koshex. It tells me everything I need to know about my daily finances and make good investment choices. My go-to-tool when it comes to investments.‚Äù 
![profile pic](https://d17dvj69ou3p5n.cloudfront.net/assets/images/landing-page/harry.jpg)

Entrepreneur and Consultant, Delhi

generated_description:
Koshex is a fintech startup based in Bengaluru, India, that aims to transform the way Indian millennials manage their money. Founded as part of Y Combinator's Batch S21, Koshex‚Äôs mission is straightforward: automate wealth creation for the 400 million Indian millennials who hold over $700 billion in investable assets. The company started with a vision akin to building Wealthfront for India, employing data-driven insights to help individuals save and invest more effectively.

Coshed operates a team of 21 passionate individuals. Their offerings focus on making investing accessible and hassle-free, with features like:

- **Mutual Funds:** Access to over 5,000 funds, allowing individuals to start investing with as little as ‚Çπ100.
- **Smart Deposits:** A superior alternative to traditional saving accounts.
- **Digital Gold:** Enabling users to buy, sell, and accumulate 24K gold with 99.99% purity.
- **Fixed Deposits:** Offering better interest rates than conventional banks.

Emphasizing the importance of early investing, Koshex encourages users to track their net worth in real-time and manage their finances through various budgeting tools. The app aims to provide a seamless experience where users can consolidate all their investments and monitor their savings and spending habits‚Äîall under a single dashboard.

What's particularly appealing about Koshex is its user-centric approach. Their solutions are tailored to align with individual financial goals, which users have positively noted in testimonials highlighting Koshex‚Äôs effectiveness in managing their finances, both online and offline.

On the security front, Koshex prioritizes user data, employing military-grade encryption protocols to ensure that only users can access their information, bolstering trust in an era where data privacy is paramount.

The company is recognized not only by Y Combinator but also takes pride in its partnerships with prominent investment solutions, aiming to elevate the financial well-being of its community of over 100,000 users.

For those curious to learn more, their website (https://www.koshex.com) provides a wealth of information on services and how to start your financial journey with Koshex. As millennials increasingly seek to take control of their financial futures, Koshex stands as an innovative partner in automating wealth creation and fostering smarter financial habits within the digital landscape.
